summary:
Shadow Ring gives you godly sneaking abilities. If you are aggro to NPCs in sight, it does not work to escape. Extract ShadowRing.esp to Skyrim data folder. (May have to activate plugin in NMM)

Ratings by the illuminati: "g8 m8 I r8 8/8"

You can make the ring at any forge. Requires: 1 Flawless diamond , 1 flawless
descriptionHtml:
Shadow Ring gives you godly sneaking abilities. If you are aggro to NPCs in sight, it does not work to escape. Extract ShadowRing.esp to Skyrim data folder. (May have to activate plugin in NMM)

Craftable! Requires: 1 Flawless Diamond, 1 Flawless Emerald, and 10 gold ingots!

Please tell me if this is not working!

If you think crafting recipe is to hard, tell me. I can make a LITE version where it is extremely easy to make.
author: Liamjai157
